models.name: Eric Ung
models.subject: Production shoots
models.message: We've used Desk and studio for multiple shoots and it's always been a great experience. Lyn is so accomodating and the space is perfect for everything we need. It includes backdrops and any lighting equipment we need as well which is perfect. Will be back for the next shoot for sure :)

models.name: ALIBII
models.subject: Highly Recommend this studio
models.message: We had such a fun, smooth and enjoyable time at "Desk and Studio" today. A experience that can be daunting to some people being in front of a camera was made so comfortable and carefree in this space. We will definitely be back soon :)

models.name: Family Stories Photography
models.subject: First studio shooting and it was a blast!
models.message: Thank you Lyn for creating such a beautiful, cosy and warm space. The studio is lovely and all of the details are well thought off: the backgrounds, props, dressing room, you name it. Not to mention the extensive range of lighting equipment. I will definitely be coming back here :)

models.name: Nicholas Allen
models.subject: Love the space!
models.message: We had a great experience. The booking was easy. The staff were super helpful with setting up and finding us props. The 4 hr slot gave us ample time to shoot,  we loved the space itself. Everything went so smoothly. We will definitely be back if we need a studio space again. Thanks Lyn and team!

models.name: Renata Piwkowski
models.subject: Studio experience
models.message: Fantastic experience. Staff sooooo friendly and courteous. The space is beautiful and bright, with natural light and clean. Would highly recommend.

models.name: Anith Mukherjee
models.subject: Great studio space
models.message: Staff were very friendly and helpful, and studio has excellent resources. Thanks!

models.name: Oscar Dewis
models.subject: Perfect Studio
models.message: Absolutely love this space, you can’t find anything Better (especially for the price) lyn the owner is so lovely and accommodating. Not to mention nicks extensive knowledge in rigging to make your lighting dreams to come to life. So great!!

models.name: Bonnie Hansen
models.subject: Best studio experience I’ve ever had
models.message:
Love the staff! The space!! And man the light is something else! 

Thank you for being amazing! That experience at studios is needed more :)

models.name: Felipe Villegas Múnera
models.subject: This studio is AMAZING!
models.message: This studio has everything that you need!!! Lights, softbox, umbrellas, backdrops, remotes, dressing rooms, cafeteria, the list goes on!! Lyn was so nice and helpful and made our life so much easier. Really appreciate it!

models.name: Bubblegum Newsletter
models.subject: Amazing Team and Studio!
models.message: We've worked with Lyn and team for years now. It has always been a breeze working with them. They are one of our families in business!
